{"step_by_step_thinking": "Hemostatic agents are used to stop bleeding. Collagen is a common hemostatic agent used in surgery. Ferric sulphate is also used as a hemostatic agent. CaOH2, or calcium hydroxide, is used in dentistry for root canal treatment, but it is not a hemostatic agent. Fridge dried bone is used in bone grafting procedures, but it is not a hemostatic agent.", "answer_choice": "B. CaOH2"}
